definition: to comment/to talk about/to discuss/discussion/CL:個|个[ge4]
abbr. for 論語|论语[Lun2 yu3], The Analects (of Confucius)
opinion/view/theory/doctrine/to discuss/to talk about/to regard/to consider/per/by the (kilometer, hour etc)
see 議論紛紛|议论纷纷[yi4 lun4 fen1 fen1]

sentences.english: This aspect of Luke's work has occasioned much discussion.
sentences.chinese: 这方面的卢克工作的情况，议论纷纭。

sentences.english: His argument does not get to the heart of the topic.
sentences.chinese: 他的这篇议论文并没有把握住主题的肯綮。

sentences.english: With the brief, simple language, the argument is continuous throughout the poem.
sentences.chinese: 议论依附于一种简洁平白的语言，并贯穿于整首诗作。

sentences.english: City wall top and bottom discusses in succession, coax noisy voice in, that white fog is pile up near.
sentences.chinese: 城墙上下议论纷纷，哄吵声中，那片白雾越来越近。

sentences.english: They dicussed about the new laws.
Some samples of Occam's discussions may be useful.
sentences.chinese: 奥卡姆议论中的某些例证可能有些用处。

sentences.english: Such opinions not only contradict historical facts but also harm China-Africa relations.
sentences.chinese: 这些议论既不符合历史事实，也损害中非关系。

sentences.english: By now, many people encircled looked, schoolmates much discussion.
sentences.chinese: 这时，许多人都围上来看，同学们纷纷议论。

sentences.english: As you know, I am the most judgement-free human being on the earth.
sentences.chinese: 大家都知道，我是世界上最无惧议论的人。

sentences.english: City wall altitude and base discusses in succession, coax loud voice in, that white fog is scale up close.
sentences.chinese: 城墙上下议论纷纷，哄吵声中，那片白雾越来越近。

sentences.english: Zhao and Yu are talking about Profession Wang's tie.
sentences.chinese: 赵和于在议论王老师的领带。

sentences.english: Some of the students commented humorously on their teacher's cap.
sentences.chinese: 有一些学生诙谐地议论他们老师的帽子。

sentences.english: Whether they whisper to each other in swamps about illegitimate frogs.
sentences.chinese: 他们是否在草泽里悄声议论那些青蛙私生子。

sentences.english: Infamy was babbling around her in the public market-place.
sentences.chinese: 在公共市场上，她周围泛滥着对她丑行的种种议论。

sentences.english: They enjoyed talking about him behind his back.

sentences.chinese: 我不赞成背后议论别人。

definition: to gesticulate/to point out/to point the finger of blame
lively discussion with everybody talking at once

lit. to assess the head and discuss the feet (idiom); minute criticism of a woman's appearance/fig. to find fault in minor details/to remark upon a person's appearance/nitpicking/overcritical/judgmental
lit. to assess the head and discuss the feet (idiom); minute criticism of a woman's appearance/fig. to find fault in minor details/nitpicking/overcritical
to agree/to go along with/to echo (what sb says)
variant of 嘩然|哗然[hua2 ran2]
in uproar/commotion/causing a storm of protest/tumultuous
